name: Brutal Wolfenstein: Uber Hero Edition
summary:
This is the Brutal Wolfenstein's fan-made fork.
it's based on Brutal Wolfenstein Version 4.5.
This mod's concept is brings Amazing MachineGames Wolfenstein stuffs(Wolfenstein: The New Order, The Old Blood, The New Colossus, Youngblood) to Brutal Wolfenstein.

Also, gives some enhance to Brutal Wolfenstein to be more cool.
